name: hungry_geese
title: Hungry Geese
description: Similar to the classic snake game with multiple players

columns.description: Horizontal number of cells on the board.

rows.description: Vertical number of cells on the board.

hunger_rate.description: The number of steps before the goose shrinks a cell.

min_food.description: The minimum amount of food present for all steps.

max_length.description: The max length any goose can be. Total reward = (max length + 1) * steps survived + goose length.

reward.description: steps survived * (max goose length + 1) + current goose length.

geese.description: List of geese in order by the agent index.

items.description: A goose represented by positions on the board.
A position of a goose with the 0 position representing the head.

food.description: Positions on the board where food is present.

index.description: Index of the current agent's goose in the list of geese.

action.description: Direction to move the head of your players goose.
